<< or elementary functions power >>

plus

Addition, + operator

Syntax

C = plus(A, B)
C = A + B

Input argument

A

a variable

B

a variable

Output argument

C

result of A + B

Description

C = plus(A, B) performs addition A + B variables.

Examples

plus(3, 4)
3 + 4


[1, 2] + 1
plus([1, 2], 1)


ones(0, 0) + 1

See also

minus, uplus.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
